page.title: 19CUSTOMS OF THE LUSTON AREA
page.content: In our area certain people believe in certain customs,traditions and superstitions.Every year in October we have a{HARVEST FESTIVAL.}We all go to {EYE CHURCH}and have a special service thanking {GOD}for giving us a good crop.Then the next Saturday we have a {HARVEST SUPPER }. Early in February we have another special service called {CANDLEMASS }where we think of the light of{JESUS}and at the end we carry candles around the church.We hang {HORSE-SHOES }in the shape of an U for we believe it brings good luck.It is said to be bad luck to walk under ladders.If you break a mirror it is supposed to be 7 years bad luck.On October 31st it is{HALLOWE'EN.}We play games,such as Apple Bobbing or Trick or Treat.In April the first day is {APRIL FOOL'S DAY} where people play tricks on other people until midday.
